content.question: A person uses the availability heuristic to

choices.label: maintain a positive self-concept during times of stress
make a decision quickly by using the first information that comes to mind
avoid making the fundamental attribution error
prevent making a base-rate fallacy error

content.answer: make a decision quickly by using the first information that comes to mind
